alert.note: Alert for Benzie; Grand Traverse; Leelanau (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 1:54PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Leelanau, northern Benzie and southwestern Grand Traverse Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 153 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Honor, or near Beulah, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Honor, Lake Ann and Bendon around 200 PM EDT. Interlochen around 205 PM EDT. Grawn and Interlochen State Park around 210 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Traverse City, Greilickville and Traverse City State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
